doc.after: Verizon is the title sponsor for a number of sporting and entertainment arenas including the Verizon Center in Washington DC 133 the Verizon Wireless Arena in Manchester New Hampshire 134 the Verizon Arena in North Little Rock Arkansas 135 and the Verizon Wireless Center in Mankato Minnesota 136 Verizon is also currently the title sponsor of five entertainment amphitheaters in locations throughout the United States four being individually referred to as the Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre in Irvine California Maryland Heights Missouri Selma Texas and Alpharetta Georgia The fifth is the Verizon Theatre at Grand Prairie Texas
